BackEnd

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • BackEnd.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores details about the player while they are in-game, for example their inventory or player number.
    Author:
    Brandon Chan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(SilkBag silkBag, Gameboard gameboard)
      Create a player and give them the silk bag and gameboard references.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawTile()
      Draw a tile - if the player's previous action card draw is still in its grace period, add it to inventory first.
      java.util.ArrayList<ActionTile> getInventory()
      Method to get the action tiles in the player's inventory.
      boolean hasBeenBacktracked()
      Gets whether the player has had the backtrack action used on them in the history of the current game.
      Tile isHolding()
      Returns the player's last drawn tile
      void playActionTile(Coordinate location, ActionTile tile, int playerNumber)
      Method for playing a freeze or fire tile
      void playFloorTile(Coordinate slideLocations, FloorTile tile)
      Play a floor tile in a given location and rotation.
      void setBeenBackTracked()
      Set that this player cannot be backtracked again.

        Method to get the action tiles in the player's inventory.
        Returns:
        inventory The action tiles in the player's inventory.

      • drawTile

        public void drawTile()
        Draw a tile - if the player's previous action card draw is still in its grace period, add it to inventory first.

      • playFloorTile

        public void playFloorTile(Coordinate slideLocations,
                          FloorTile tile)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Play a floor tile in a given location and rotation.
        Parameters:
        slideLocations - Where the player wants to slide a tile in from
        tile - What tile the player wants to play
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • playActionTile

        public void playActionTile(Coordinate location,
                           ActionTile tile,
                           int playerNumber)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for playing a freeze or fire tile
        Parameters:
        location - The center of the freeze/fire location null if action doesn't has a location
        tile - The freeze or fire action tile
        playerNumber - the player that this is played on. ignored if action isn't played on a player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public Tile isHolding()
        Returns the player's last drawn tile
        Returns:
        lastDrawnTile The player's last drawn tile

      • setBeenBackTracked

        public void setBeenBackTracked()
        Set that this player cannot be backtracked again.

      • hasBeenBacktracked

        public boolean hasBeenBacktracked()
        Gets whether the player has had the backtrack action used on them in the history of the current game.
        Returns:
        backTracked Record of if backtrack action has been used on this player
